resources.string: For obtaining UI hierarchy, providing faster interface analysis for AI assistant, without collecting or storing any personal information.
Deleting all chat history is irreversible. Consider exporting a backup before proceeding.
Backup files are saved in the \"Downloads/Operit\" folder
Installing bundled Termux, please grant installation permissions
Operit AI is an intelligent assistant application that helps users use their devices more efficiently, providing interface analysis, chat conversations, and more.
Start a new conversation. Enter your question to get AI response.
This is a simulated AI response. In the actual application, real AI API calls will be integrated here.
Network connection unavailable, please check your network settings
We use DeepSeek API by default. For alternatives, click the custom option below
Your own token is more stable. Excessive use of free tier may lead to service limitations

You will be directed to the DeepSeek API website. We integrate DeepSeek access because we consider it the most cost-effective API with powerful performance, various discounts, and disk caching to reduce usage costs.

API access and token configuration are not related to the app developers, and we do not provide any services in this regard or earn any fees.

For your first token usage, we recommend starting with a small amount as it's usually sufficient.
Please use sparingly, our resources are limited
Don\'t overuse the free tier, developers have costs too
Our resources are limited, please be considerate
Each free use counts, please value every opportunity
Our budget is crying, please be gentle
Daily free usage: Used %1$d times, %2$d remaining\nFree status will last until app exit
Please try again tomorrow or use your own API key
Please wait %1$d days before using again~
Today\'s free quota all gone QAQ
To prevent developer bankruptcy, waiting time doubles after each use~
This is your first use, next time you\'ll need to wait 1 day~
Free stuff comes with limits, please wait %1$d more days (๑•̀ㅂ•́)و✧
Loading timeout, you can click \"Skip\" in the top right corner to continue
MCP server failed to start, you can click \"Skip\" in the top right corner to continue
Termux is not running, unable to start plugins
Termux is not authorized, please authorize Termux before using plugins
Node.js not installed in Termux, please install Node.js before using plugins
Bridge initialization failed, unable to start plugins
Error occurred while starting plugins, you can click \"Skip\" in the top right corner to continue
Startup completed, success rate: %1$d%%. Some plugins failed to load
When enabled, theme will automatically switch based on system dark mode
When enabled, you can customize the app\'s main colors
Tip: High contrast color combinations work best
When enabled, you can select a custom background image or video
Click select button to add background
Video file is too large and may cause lag or crashes. Please select videos less than 30MB.
Cannot copy video, please select another video
Background image migrated to internal storage
Unable to access old background image, background image feature has been disabled
Overlay permission denied, cannot display floating window
Enhanced AI service not initialized, please check settings
Display real-time FPS in the upper right corner
Configure personal information and preferences to help AI better understand you, including age, personality, identity, occupation, and expected AI style
Customize AI assistant\'s system prompts, including self-introduction and tone style, to better meet your expectations
Personalize app appearance, including dark/light mode and custom color schemes
Import, export, or delete chat history and problem library data for easy backup and recovery of important information
Configure API settings, model names and parameters, with support for multiple configuration management
Configure specialized models and API settings for different functions (such as chat, summarization, problem library, etc.)
When enabled, AI will have certain forgetting capabilities
When disabled, manual authorization is required each time the app is opened
Configure permission levels for AI assistant tools, can be set to auto-allow, ask, or deny
Why Should I Care About Token Statistics?

Because it\'s like a restaurant bill, except the \'food\' is AI thinking and the \'money\' is calculated in RMB! Preference analysis is the AI observing your tastes to customize your next \'menu\'. Don\'t worry, even if you chat until your fingers cramp, these costs might not be enough to buy a bubble tea~
Installing bundled Shizuku, please grant installation permission
Built-in Shizuku installation failed, please try installing from the app store
To better serve you, please complete the following settings
Once locked, user preference information cannot be modified
Package with same name already exists
Change the display language of the application
The app will restart automatically to apply the new language setting
Please read the following agreement carefully before using our app
I have read and agree to the agreement

Thank you for choosing our application! Before you start using it, please carefully read the following important statement:

1. Disclaimer
 This software has powerful features that may have potential destructive capabilities. The developer is not responsible for any operations performed by users or their consequences.

2. Official Download Channel
 For your safety, please download this software only from our official GitHub repository. We are not responsible for security risks from other download sources.

3. Open Source License
 This software is an open-source project under the GPL (GNU General Public License). Users can freely use, modify, and distribute this software, but must comply with the GPL license terms.

4. Third-Party Use
 We are not responsible for how third parties use, modify, or distribute this software. Any derivative works or related actions are not associated with the original developers.

5. User Behavior
 Users bear all risks and legal responsibilities for using this software. Please ensure your usage complies with local laws and regulations.

6. Termination Clause
 We reserve the right to terminate usage rights if users violate this agreement.

7. No Warranty Statement
 This software is provided "as is" without any form of warranty, including but not limited to suitability, reliability, or accuracy.

8. Limitation of Liability
 To the maximum extent permitted by law, we are not responsible for any direct or indirect losses caused by using this software.

9. Agreement Modification
 We may modify this agreement from time to time, and modified terms will take effect upon publication.

10. Applicable Law
 This agreement is governed by the laws of the People's Republic of China.

Regarding your privacy, please understand the following important information:

1. No Data Collection
 We do not actively collect any of your personal information or usage data. The design philosophy of this application is to respect user privacy and not engage in any form of data collection.

2. Local Processing
 All data processing is completed locally on your device and will not be uploaded to our servers or any third-party servers. Therefore, your private data security is entirely under your control.

3. Third-Party Services
 If this application integrates any third-party services or libraries, their data processing behavior is beyond our control. Please refer to the privacy policies of relevant third parties.

4. Permission Statement
 This application may require certain system permissions to function properly. These permissions are only used for implementing application features and not for collecting your personal information.

5. Open Source Transparency
 As an open source project, our code is publicly transparent to everyone. You can view the source code on GitHub to verify our privacy statement.

6. No Liability Statement
 Since we do not collect or store user data, we are not responsible for any user data leakage, loss, or misuse.

7. Policy Updates
 We may update this privacy policy, and updated policies will be published on GitHub and updated in the application.

8. Contact Us
 If you have any questions about the privacy policy, please contact us through the GitHub project page.
Unable to connect to server, please check your network
Server connection timeout, please check your network or try again later
Server refused connection, please try again later
Connection timeout, please check your network
Cannot resolve server address, please check your network
Request timeout, please try again later
Network transfer failed, please check your connection
Request failed, please try again later
Before using the app, we need to set up some basic permissions and select your preferred permission level.
This process takes just a few minutes and will help the app serve you better.
Click the button in the lower right corner to start setup
Please grant the following basic permissions to ensure the app functions properly
Allow the app to read and write files
Allow the app to display floating windows
Allow the app to run in the background
Allow the app to access location information
All basic permissions granted, you can continue to the next step
You have not granted all necessary permissions, which may result in incomplete functionality or abnormal app behavior. Are you sure you want to continue?
Please select your preferred permission level, which will determine the range of features the app can use
Basic app operation permissions, no special permissions required
Provides ADB-level system access through Shizuku
Superuser permissions, can perform any system operations
You can change the permission level in settings at any time
Cannot open storage permission settings, please authorize manually
Cannot open overlay settings, please authorize manually
Please find the app in the list and set it to \"Not optimized\"
Cannot open battery optimization settings, please set manually
Congratulations! Root permission has been granted. You can now perform privileged operations.
Your device is rooted, but the app hasn\'t been granted root permission. Please click the button below to request permission from your ROOT manager (like Magisk, SuperSU, etc.).
1. Click the \"Request Root Permission\" button below\n2. Select \"Allow\" in the ROOT manager popup\n3. If you don\'t see a popup, check your ROOT manager settings
Your device is not rooted. ROOT requires specific system modifications and may void your warranty. If you need to use ROOT features, please complete the device ROOT process first.
1. ROOT operations carry risk and may void your warranty\n2. Some apps may refuse to run on rooted devices\n3. Improper ROOT operations may cause system instability
Shizuku is a tool that grants apps advanced permissions without requiring root. We need to install this app first.
Shizuku is installed. Now you need to start the Shizuku service. Please follow one of the methods below:

1. Click the "Open Shizuku" button below
2. In the Shizuku app, select "Start via Wireless Debugging"
3. Follow the prompts to enable "Developer Options" and "Wireless Debugging"
4. Allow Shizuku to get wireless debugging permissions

1. Install ADB tools on your computer
2. Connect your phone to your computer via USB
3. Execute in computer command line:
 adb shell sh /sdcard/Android/data/moe.shizuku.privileged.api/files/start.sh
Shizuku service is running. Now you need to grant permission to this app. Click the button below and select \"Allow\" in the dialog that appears.
Note: If you don\'t see the authorization dialog, check:
1. Whether the Shizuku service is running\n2. Try restarting the Shizuku service\n3. Confirm you\'ve allowed overlay display permission
Congratulations! Shizuku is fully set up. You can now use debugging permission features.
The app has a newer version of Shizuku built in. We recommend updating for better compatibility and features.
Termux is a powerful terminal emulator that allows you to use various command line tools. We need to install this app first.
After installation, please open Termux for the first time and wait for initialization to complete, then return to this app to complete the authorization step.
Termux is installed. Now you need to grant Termux the necessary permissions so we can execute commands.
1. Termux is installed and has been opened at least once\n2. Click the \"Check and Authorize\" button to complete authorization
Termux is installed and authorized but not currently running. Configuration operations require Termux to be running in the background.
Termux is authorized but not running. Please launch Termux to continue with the next setup steps.

Termux is running. Now you need to exempt Termux from battery optimization so it can run stably in the background for extended periods. Android\'s battery optimization feature may close Termux in the background, affecting scripts and services.

Termux is exempt from battery optimization. Now you need to configure the Tuna mirror to speed up package downloads. Tuna mirror is a Chinese mirror that can significantly increase Termux package download speeds.
Tuna mirror is configured. Now you need to install the Python environment. Python is a popular programming language that many AI tools and automation scripts require.
Python is installed. Now you need to install the UV package manager. UV is a fast Python package manager and resolver that can replace pip and provide better dependency management.
UV is installed. Now you need to install the Node.js environment. Node.js is a JavaScript runtime environment used for running JavaScript code and web applications.
Congratulations! Termux environment is fully configured
You can now use Termux for various command line operations
Failed to extract APK, please try again later
Shizuku installation started, please follow system prompts to complete installation
Shizuku update started, please follow system prompts to complete installation
Termux installation started, please follow system prompts to complete installation
Built-in APK installation failed, opening download page
Cannot open download link, please download and install Termux manually
Skipped Tuna mirror configuration, you can configure the mirror in Termux later
Basic application permissions, no special system authorization required
Added accessibility service support, can simulate screen operations
Added device administrator permissions, can access more system functions
Provides ADB-level system access through Shizuku
Superuser permissions, can execute any system operations
Standard Permissions: Basic application permissions, no special privileges required
Accessibility Permissions: Allows the app to simulate user operations, requires enabling accessibility services
Admin Permissions: Allows the app to access more system functions, such as location services
Debug Permissions: Allows advanced operations through ADB debugging functions, requires Shizuku service
Root Permissions: Allows the app to run as superuser, requires a rooted device
App has gained Root access, can execute privileged commands
Device is rooted, click to request app permissions
Device is not rooted, unable to obtain Root permissions
Failed to extract APK, please try again later
Skipped Tuna mirror configuration, you can configure the mirror in Termux later

You have chosen to skip Tuna mirror configuration. For manual configuration later, run the following command in Termux:

termux-change-repo

Then select Tuna or another mirror from the list.
Overlay permission denied, floating window mode closed
Background image has been migrated to internal storage
Unable to access old background image, background image feature has been disabled
Supports conversion between multiple file formats, convenient and fast
Browse and manage device files, supports multiple operations
Powerful command line terminal to execute system commands
Automatically install and configure Python, PIP and other development tools
Manage permissions for various apps on the phone, protect privacy and security
Debug and analyze UI elements, supports element search and interaction
Powerful audio and video processing tool, supports conversion, cropping, merging, etc.
High-performance streaming Markdown rendering demo, supports real-time character flow effect
Execute Shell commands and view output results, supports common command presets
Capture and view system and app logs in real time, supports filtering and searching
A collection of convenient and practical tools to improve your work efficiency
Please select a download source suitable for your network environment:
Accelerated via ghfast.top, recommended for users in China
Direct download from GitHub official server, speed may be slower
